title: Spiced lemon cheesecake
ingredients: ['300g digestive biscuits', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '125g unsalted butter, melted', '750g cream cheese', '200g caster sugar', '1 tablespoon grated lemon zest', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '4 large eggs, lightly beaten', '300ml single cream', '2 teaspoons pure vanilla extract', '1 teaspoon lemon extract', '1 teaspoon sugar', '1/2 teaspoon cinnamon']
